project_abstract.cdata: The main objective of Fourth Inland Waterways Project  is to improve access for poor regions of southern China by upgrading navigation conditions on the region's major east-west river and other waterways feeding traffic into the Pearl River Delta region. A secondary objective is to harness water flow in two of these rivers to generate environmentally clean electricity to help meet growing energy demand in the provinces of Guangdong Autonomous Region and Guangxi. There are two components, each with multi-subcomponents. The first component for Guangxi constructs a dam, power station, and shiplock; builds access roads; provides bank protection with reservoirs and a dam; installs turbines, lock gates, and other equipment; supports channel improvement; supports institutional strengthening, consultants services, and training; and provides finance for resettlement and land acquisition, as well as for site management. The second component for Guangdong Autonomous Region supports channel improvement; replacement of two bridges, construction of a dam, power station, shiplock, and access road; the installation of turbines, lock gates, and other equipment; upgrades navigational aids; the purchase of computer hardware for electronic mapping, shiplock management, and a management information system; the financing of service vessels, services vehicles, a survey, monitoring, and ancillary equipment; institutional strengthening, consultant services, and training; and land acquisition.

P077137.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>第四内河航运项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>该项目的目的是改善中国广东省和广西壮族自治区的主要的东西走向河道和其他水道航运，为南方贫困地区的生产者创造更多的出口机会，并利用水力发电满足日益增长的能源需求。在广西，项目将整治百色和南宁间的右江河道使大型船只能够通过，修建那吉大坝发电。在广东，项目将改善北部山区北江和练江的航运条件，修建西牛大坝发电。这两个地区目前都面临电力短缺。在广东，该项目还将对一条流经珠江三角洲的河道进行加宽加深，使较大的船只能够在广东省西南部农村地区和深圳、珠海、香港等工业化地区之间安全航行。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
